title: That Teleport Nerf.
body:
On the July 5th PBE Update, they nerfed the Teleport Summoner Spell.

Cooldown: 300 secs ---> 360 Secs
[Removed]: Teleport no longer has a reduced Cooldown if cancelled.

These seem like hefty nerfs, is there any context behind them?

replies.body: Great... Now toplane will get even more snowball oriented and decided more by the jungler...

> [{quoted}](name=Naymliss,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rv7ZuMVm,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-05T23:18:11.456+0000)
>
> Great... Now toplane will get even more snowball oriented and decided more by the jungler...

And the cancer {{champion:23}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:133}} decide game with ignite since they can use their manaless skills to move faster to lane.

> [{quoted}](name=ValiantKiller,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rv7ZuMVm,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-07-05T23:35:55.586+0000)
>
> And the cancer {{champion:23}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:266}} decide game with ignite since they can use their manaless skills to move faster to lane.

You’re talking abou such an insignificant amount of time that I’m having a hard time putting into words how shockingly unimportant that is - especially when you could’ve simply said this gives manaless/sustain based champion an even bigger edge in lane and leave it at that and you would’ve been correct!
I mean he's not wrong. It does knock off like 5 seconds walking back to lane, on top of their in-lane sustain.

> [{quoted}](name=Danjeng,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rv7ZuMVm,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-06T04:32:39.442+0000)
>
> I mean he's not wrong. It does knock off like 5 seconds walking back to lane, on top of their in-lane sustain.

5 seconds? Maybe on crap like riven but aside from that, that’s a huge reach
True their lack of need to back for mana is more significant. The 1 second they get back to lane sooner is relevant but not relative to their 2 minutes they get to stay in lane do to no mana.

> [{quoted}](name=ValiantKiller,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rv7ZuMVm,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-07-05T23:35:55.586+0000)
>
> And the cancer {{champion:23}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:266}} decide game with ignite since they can use their manaless skills to move faster to lane.

u forgot riven
Good thing junglers don't gank in my elo{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Everyone and their mother uses TP now. Even ADCs use it. 

I'm just waiting for the inevitable Shen nerf when he becomes pick or ban in competitive because Stand United has a much lower cooldown and channel time than TP.

This. The amount of ADCs and midlaners taking teleport is kinda ridiculous.
I mean a few midlaners took TP before, but now I see it pretty much every game.
I don't see why its an issue for other people to take TP though. .-. Especially since ADCs only started to do it so they wouldn't get screwed over as hard by those early game nerfs.
That, and heal got nerfed pretty hard with the cooldown
This too. :/ They made heal's cool down longer and then to add insult to injury, they buffed ignite's damage. Just what do they want ADC's to take as a secondary defensive sum?

{{summoner:21}} for survival, I guess? Problem with heal is that it can heal two people and provides a short MS boost; it would be unhealthy for it to counter ignite with that level of power. Mages have been taking it as a defensive measure against assassins, don't see why marksman can't.

Usually, as a support main I prefer the bot laner (not just ADC) to take heal, but you can take barrier I guess if survival is more important. I'd probably nab heal (if it's a defensive lane) or ignite (if it's an aggressive lane versus an aggressive lane since they'll likely target you).

But they all take TP because leaving your lane is so punishing and a numbers advantage will not only win a fight, but TP at the right time gets you one or two towers.

This is backwards balancing again.

Make towers stronger again, so that you don't need to win just one fight, but two or three to get the tower and people will consider fighting spells again.

So they're gonna buff ignite and then nerf teleport?  The only reason half these people bring teleport is because they're being blown up in lane and have to make sure they can get back as soon as possible to mitigate this crazy damage snowball.  It's a defense against the ridiculousness, and instead of fixing the stupidity that is this damage meta, Riot just wants to continuously nerf everything that might be able to survive against it (goodbye shields.)
Remember when tp had a 2.5 sec channel and got reduced cd on turrets
Remember when TP Revive Karthus was a thing?
The Dude legit had 4 Lives and it was fantastic

I remember the Smite Revive strat with Evelynn. You'd go and do some camps, execute yourself to one, then revive and go about your day because her clear sucked and dying and reviving was so much faster than backing.

> [{quoted}](name=UnboundHades,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rv7ZuMVm,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-07-05T23:37:29.092+0000)
>
> Remember when tp had a 2.5 sec channel and got reduced cd on turrets

good times...

When ignite was heavily buffed they said it was because it was being "outshone" by teleport. This wasnt even true, at least for midlane.

Now teleport it being even more outshone by ignite and guess what? They're nerfing it heavily!

Im fucking positive that riot wants to lose their playerbase at this point. Nobody likes this retarded damage meta.

Mages teleport every time vs assassin matchup. Unless the mage stand a better chance at killing the assassin than other mages.

(Besides that point^)
But if you had ignite and lost one trade, you got snowballed. period. You didn't get a kill and lost a lot of minions to kill. The opponent is up part of an item. You could lose 1/3 of tower hp when you lose a trade at lvl 6-10 and u carried ignite.

Tho ignite doesn't need to be buffed. It's honestly fine.
Probably for some bullshit like "Top lane summoner spell diversity"

Another thing abused by adcs is being nerfed
This isn't new
I forgot teleport is exclusive for toplane lol
Can't wait to see all top laners take {{summoner:14}}, if this nerf goes through.
They don't call it League of Damage for nothing

ADC GETS TP BECAUSE BARRIER AND HEAL ARE TERRIBLE NOW....

Ideas.... Buff heal
Buff Barrier
Nerf Teleport.... You got the job!

> [{quoted}](name=Light of Madness,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rv7ZuMVm,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2018-07-06T04:53:19.668+0000)
>
> ADC GETS TP BECAUSE BARRIER AND HEAL ARE TERRIBLE NOW....
> 
> Ideas.... Buff heal
> Buff Barrier
> Nerf Teleport.... You got the job!

Or just nerf ignite ?
Nerf ignite? YOU ARE FIRED!

The game is around to get fed asap, so u can oneshot the biggest tanks. I mean, RIOT must nerf dmg and some champs like {{champion:142}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:238}}  and some like them, because they can kill you with 2 items, and, you see it's realy unfair for some weaker champions. Better if they work on it, instead of nerfing {{summoner:12}} . It's my opinion.
part of every one taking TP now in bot lane and the reduced death timers early game too

> [{quoted}](name=MrFawknSunshine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rv7ZuMVm,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-07-05T23:19:30.165+0000)
>
> part of every one taking TP now in bot lane and the reduced death timers early game too

Not really, bot laners taking TP has been a thing before death timers got reduced. 

When every role (except jungle) takes this and is able to impact every other lane with little issue or just go back to your lane after backing giving you access to the minion wave before your lane opponent and the only answer is to "take TP or watch as your opponent impacts every other lane" then it's time to get nerfed

instead of nerfing TP , they could do something else, like buffing other summoners so TP stays as is and others summoners would be slightly stronger so you have to make a decision but by this nerf no one will have tp at all .
I wish top lane was just impactful without the need to teleport once every 5minutes. It feels really isolated when you take anything other than teleport.

I can't wait to see 3 ignites in every game.
Sometimes 4 with Shaco.

I'm so glad I was convincing myself to quit this game.

> [{quoted}](name=Phöbia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rv7ZuMVm,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-07-05T23:07:55.786+0000)
>
> On the July 5th PBE Update, they nerfed the Teleport Summoner Spell.
> 
> Cooldown: 300 secs ---&gt; 360 Secs
> [Removed]: Teleport no longer has a reduced Cooldown if cancelled.
> 
> These seem like hefty nerfs, is there any context behind them?

On my fucking birthday even. what a dickmove. TP doesn't need a nerf. Damage does.
welp guess i'm gonna go with ignite now
Get ready for the full ignite meta. lol
Why nerf {{summoner:12}}? {{summoner:14}} is a much bigger problem if you ask me.

> [{quoted}](name=Raymønd Åmantius,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rv7ZuMVm,comment-id=0029,timestamp=2018-07-06T22:46:31.876+0000)
>
> Why nerf {{summoner:12}}? {{summoner:14}} is a much bigger problem if you ask me.

Cause that is riot buddy, they nerf the weak and buff the strong.
Look at the bright side, at least it will slow down the game for 5 seconds.

> [{quoted}](name=Auccuatt,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rv7ZuMVm,comment-id=0027,timestamp=2018-07-06T20:34:02.900+0000)
>
> Look at the bright side, at least it will slow down the game for 5 seconds.

Speed up*

Early lane setbacks result in full on early lane losses and inhibs down without Teleport.
we {{summoner:14}}  now!
Tanks that get bullied out of lane by bruisers needed nerfed because 2% of the player base dared pick them.
When you have top, mid, and ADCs (sometimes even supports) taking teleport over anything else you know that something is wrong.
I just assumed it's because everybody was using it, I only ever see other supports take tp instead of exhaust.
They are trying to kill teleport I see. Last few years they only kept nerfing it again and again. I don't know why they don't give reasons to use combat summs instead of nerfing teleport

Well most people are picking teleport in competitive because it's the best summoner in case you die or need to return quickly.

That said, I think it's about time we put teleport on an item/boot enchant so everyone can get it and make games actually more about defending/getting to the action.
